title: Electricity distribution networks resilience in area exposed to salt dust: Fragility curve modeling of insulators, Monte Carlo-based resilience assessment, and enhancement measures
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Amin Dadashzade, Hossein Bagherzadeh, Masood Mottaghizadeh, Tohid Ghanizadeh Bolandi, Mohammad Hassan Amirioun, Maryam Majidzadeh, Sajjad Golshannavaz, Farrokh Aminifar
